name: ECHO steplights - NEW!
description: [download the ECHO steplight spec sheet] the interlocking aluminum rings and the joinery in assembly become the beauty of this flat-packing fixture. steplights are machined out of recycled aluminum and range from 16" - 17.5" in diameter. you'll receive your steplight in a flattened state with simple instructions to maximize efficiency. assembly does not require any tools, adhesives, or fasteners. steplights celebrate the beauty of raw aluminum and are buffed and finished with a clear protective coating.

name: TILT scraplight floor lamp
description: [download a TILT floor lamp spec sheet] Locally crafted and built to last, each TILT lamp features a hand-blackened sturdy steel frame, porcelain lamp holder, textile wrapped cord, bottom felt pad, and durable rocker switch. Easily swappable and secured into place using two heavy-duty knurled thumbscrews, our signature repurposed cardboard shades make these the perfect warm accent for that lonely table, dark corner, or blank space. All scraplight lamps are UL-listed portables rated for use in commercial projects, and all shades are treated with a Class-A non-toxic fire retardant. ** Please note that this product ships on a pallet through a private freight company. **

name: OHIO_24 scraplights
description: [download an OHIO_24 spec sheet] the OHIO series boasts a slick blending of materials including sturdy clear-coated steel frames, frosted tempered glass lenses, and our most efficient handmade repurposed cardboard shades to date. lamped with a trio of bulbs (incandescent or compact fluorescent), the OHIO scrap lights provide a generous amount of both up and down-lighting - perfect for commercial and residential environments. all OHIO fixtures come standard with an 8'-0" long UL-listed hard-wired cord + cable set with matching powder-coated ceiling canopy. cords and canopies are available in black and white, and longer cords are available upon request. please allow for a lead time of about 4 weeks. if you are located outside of the united states or canada, please [contact the nearest distributor] for order inquiries.

name: SLICE cafe + dining chairs
description: [download a slice cafe chair spec sheet] [download a slice dining chair spec sheet] introducing the brand new slice cafe + dining chairs! this is one cool chair. why? because three whole chairs can be made from just one sheet of plywood. because the only waste created is sawdust. because it’s low-VOC finish is a byproduct of cheese! the maple chairs use beautiful FSC-certified eurostyle plywood compliant with LEED and CARB ratings, and two sizes are available: the standard dining chair and the slightly more compact cafe chair conducive to bustling settings. walnut-veneer versions and tinted finishes are available upon request - please inquire!
